project_descr: The project presents invaluable employment opportunities and the creation of an environment to explore the economic potential of the Garibaldi Hill area thereby enhancing the tourism product and by extension economic development.

outputs.output_descr: The project provides the opportunity for sustainable development that is mindful of the importance of climate resilient structures through the consideration of flood mitigation and improved drainage infrastructure.

document_name: Environment  Remediation and Protection in Montserrat project document
